recipe.title: Steak & Asparagus Skewers Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 lb ; sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) chunks ; (455 g)
2 cups ; asparagus, cut into 1-inch (2 1/2 cm) pieces ; (250 g)

steps.step: Skewer 3-4 pieces of steak and asparagus in an alternating pattern on a bamboo skewer.
Repeat with remaining steak and asparagus.
Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Sear 3-4 skewers at a time, seasoning with salt and pepper, and flip when the undersides are a dark brown.
Season the other side with salt and pepper, and cook for about 1 more minute.
